### recede() {#a7838950673480bf3ece5ddf4f4fe0132}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void GCNUpwardRPTracker::recede (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI)</>}>
Move to the state of RP just before the <code>MI</code> .

If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is set, also update the internal iterators. Setting <code>UseInternalIterator</code> to false allows for an externally managed iterator / program order.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h/#l00224">224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h">GCNRegPressure.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp/#l00436">436</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp">GCNRegPressure.cpp</a>.
